com.flopsar.api.fdbc

Interface Connection


  • public interface Connection
    The API interface provides basic methods to access all the data in the Flopsar database.

    The API methods, by design, do not perform any extra processing on the data.

    Each method is thread-safe.

    Since:
    2.3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LOGGER
      A name of the FDBC logger.

      • getMethodSymbol

        Symbol getMethodSymbol(org.objectweb.asm.commons.Method methodId)
        Retrieves a Symbol object corresponding to the specified method definition.
        Parameters:
        methodId - method definition.
        Returns:
        Symbol object or null if the symbol was not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • methodId is null
        Since:
        2.3
        See Also:
        Method

      • findSymbols

        void findSymbols(SymbolType symbolType,
                 FindEvent<Symbol> eventCallback)
        Retrieves a collection of Symbol objects of the specified SymbolType type.
        Parameters:
        symbolType - type of symbols to retrieve.
        eventCallback - called whenever a symbol is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • symbolType is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findSymbols

        void findSymbols(SymbolType symbolType,
                 Pattern namePattern,
                 FindEvent<Symbol> eventCallback)
        Retrieves Symbol objects of the specified SymbolType type, whose names match the specified pattern.
        Parameters:
        symbolType - type of symbols to retrieve.
        namePattern - pattern every symbol name should match. If null, this method is equivalent to #findSymbols(AgentId, SymbolType, FindEvent).
        eventCallback - called whenever a symbol is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • symbolType is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findKeysWithData

        void findKeysWithData(AgentId agent,
                      FindEvent<Symbol> eventCallback)
        Retrieves symbols of type SymbolType.SYMBOL_KV but only those, which have accompanying data in the database.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        eventCallback - called whenever a symbol is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findKeyValues

        void findKeyValues(AgentId agent,
                   Symbol key,
                   TimeRange trange,
                   FindEvent<MetricValue> eventCallback)
        Retrieves metric values for the specified key and within the specified time range.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        key - metric symbol.
        trange - time range.
        eventCallback - called whenever a metric is found. Note: the MetricValue object passed to the FindEvent.onFound(Object) method always refers to the same instance and its values are updated every time the callback method is executed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • key is null or its type is not SymbolType.SYMBOL_KV
        • eventCallback is null
        • trange is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findKeyValues

        void findKeyValues(AgentId agent,
                   Symbol key,
                   FindEvent<MetricValue> eventCallback)
        Retrieves all metric values for the specified key.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        key - metric symbol.
        eventCallback - called whenever a metric is found. Note: the MetricValue object passed to the FindEvent.onFound(Object) method always refers to the same instance and its values are updated every time the callback method is executed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • key is null or its type is not SymbolType.SYMBOL_KV
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findMethodInvocations

        void findMethodInvocations(AgentId agent,
                           String className,
                           org.objectweb.asm.commons.Method methodId,
                           QueryOption opts,
                           TimeRange trange,
                           FindEvent<MethodInvocation> eventCallback)
        Retrieves invocations of a specific method defined by className and methodId and within the specified time range.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        className - fully qualified class name.
        methodId - method definition.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false.
        trange - time range.
        eventCallback - called whenever data are found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • className is null or empty
        • methodId is null
        • trange is null
        • eventCallback is null
        See Also:
        Method

      • findMethodInvocations

        void findMethodInvocations(AgentId agent,
                           String className,

                           QueryOption opts,
                           FindEvent<MethodInvocation> eventCallback)

        className - fully qualified class name.
        methodId - method definition.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false.
        eventCallback - called whenever data are found.

      • findMethodInvocations

        void findMethodInvocations(AgentId agent,
                           Pattern className,
                           Pattern methodName,
                           QueryOption opts,
                           TimeRange trange,
                           FindEvent<MethodInvocation> eventCallback)
        Retrieves invocations of methods satisfying the specified conditions, i.e. className and methodName. If both className and methodName are null, then this method is equivalent to #findMethodInvocations(AgentId, QueryOption, Date, Date, FindEvent).*
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        className - pattern for class names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed.
        methodName - pattern for method names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false.
        trange - time range.
        eventCallback - called whenever data are found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • trange is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findMethodInvocations

        void findMethodInvocations(AgentId agent,
                           Pattern className,
                           Pattern methodName,
                           QueryOption opts,
                           FindEvent<MethodInvocation> eventCallback)
        Retrieves invocations of methods satisfying the specified conditions, i.e. className and methodName. If both className and methodName are null, then this method is equivalent to #findMethodInvocations(AgentId, QueryOption, Date, Date, FindEvent).*
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        className - pattern for class names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed.
        methodName - pattern for method names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false.
        eventCallback - called whenever data are found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

        trange - time range.

      • findMethodInvocationTrees

        void findMethodInvocationTrees(AgentId agent,
                               Pattern className,
                               Pattern methodName,
                               QueryOption opts,
                               TimeRange trange,
                               FindEvent<MethodInvocationTree> eventCallback)
        Retrieves method invocation trees satisfying the specified conditions. If both className and methodName patterns are specified, a tree will be returned only if both conditions are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        className - pattern for class names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed. Pattern matching holds for any tree item and stops when it finds at least one match.
        methodName - pattern for method names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed. Pattern matching holds for any tree item and stops when it finds at least one match.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false. Option QueryOption.exceptionsOnly holds only for root item.
        trange - time range.
        eventCallback - called whenever an execution tree is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • trange is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3

      • findMethodInvocationTrees

        void findMethodInvocationTrees(AgentId agent,
                               Pattern className,
                               Pattern methodName,
                               QueryOption opts,
                               FindEvent<MethodInvocationTree> eventCallback)
        Retrieves method invocation trees satisfying the specified conditions. If both className and methodName patterns are specified, a tree will be returned only if both conditions are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        agent - agent identifier.
        className - pattern for class names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed. Pattern matching holds for any tree item and stops when it finds at least one match.
        methodName - pattern for method names. If null, no pattern matching will be performed. Pattern matching holds for any tree item and stops when it finds at least one match.
        opts - additional query options. Setting null is equivalent to passing the opts object with all its options set to false. Option QueryOption.exceptionsOnly holds only for root item.
        eventCallback - called whenever an execution tree is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • agent is null
        • eventCallback is null
        Since:
        2.3
